title: Valerius's Grand Design
goal: Introduce Lord Valerius as a figure of growing influence, but with unsettling undertones, linking him subtly to the blight's spread.
stakes_shift: The threat is revealed as not just magical, but also political, with a powerful, seemingly benevolent lord potentially involved in the blight's spread.

bridge.from_prev: The group has uncovered ancient prophecies linking Eldrin to the blight.
bridge.to_next: Evidence solidifies, confirming Lord Valerius's direct connection to the blight's spread and establishing him as a clear antagonist.

sections.title: The Lord's Reach
sections.intent: Show Valerius's public persona and his increasing control over the region.

scenes.summary: Rumors of Lord Valerius's grand projects and swift, decisive governance dominate the town, painting him as a savior.
scenes.outcome: Lord Valerius is introduced as a powerful, charismatic leader, expanding his influence.

sections.title: Shadows of Benevolence
sections.intent: Introduce subtle inconsistencies or unsettling aspects of Valerius's rule.

scenes.summary: Kael's contacts reveal Valerius's sudden acquisition of blighted lands and his unusual interest in ancient ruins, raising suspicions.
scenes.outcome: The group uncovers subtle but unsettling connections between Valerius's actions and the blight's spread.

sections.title: A Web of Influence
sections.intent: Show how Valerius's power extends into the social and economic fabric of the city.

scenes.summary: Seraphina discovers Valerius's family crest subtly woven into texts describing ancient, forbidden rituals connected to life-draining magic.
scenes.outcome: Seraphina finds a historical connection between Valerius's lineage and forbidden practices, deepening suspicion.
